roleset.name: flexion in the dorsal direction
roleset.note: DORSIFLEXION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-flex.01. (from dorsiflexion.01-n)

example.name: dorsiflex-v
example.text: In the present report, [the patient]-1 was unable *PRO*-1 to dorsiflex his foot

example.name: dorsiflexion-n
example.text: Musculus gastrocnemius tightness (MGT) is the most common cause for impaired dorsiflexion of the ankle joint
